<template>
    <header class="menu-container">
      <nav>
        <router-link to="/">Home</router-link> |
        <router-link to="/login">Login</router-link>
        <BoardMenu />
      </nav>
      <hr>
    </header>
</template>

<script>
import BoardMenu from './BoardMenu.vue'

export default {
  name: 'PageHeader',
  components: {
    BoardMenu
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.menu-container {
  width: 200px;
  height: 100vh;
  background-color: #35495E; /* Dark green-blue */
  border-right: 1px solid #42B983; /* Vue.js green */
}

.menu-container nav {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 20px;
}

.menu-item {
  display: block;
  color: #fff; /* White text */
  text-decoration: none;
  padding: 10px 0;
}

.menu-item:hover {
  color: #42B983; /* Vue.js green for hover state */
}
</style>
